MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the L7 postcode area of Liverpool, affecting properties in Cheviot Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 4:54PM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a fault with the underground cable network and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:20PM on 22 February 2021.
